name: Cabin Fever: The Game from Maine
description:
Be the first to “dig out” from being “snowed-in” and score 1,000 points to win!

Cabin Fever: The Game from Maine is a game of strategy and luck for 2–8 players, ages 13 and up.

Each Cabin Fever game comes in a palm-sized, acrylic travel cube and includes five scoring dice, one “vacation” die, a plastic cabin game piece, instructions and three “I’ve got Cabin Fever!” stickers.

ALL ORDERS ARE SHIPPED
USPS PRIORITY MAIL

PLEASE ALLOW 2-4 DAYS
FOR SHIPPING & DELIVERY
